Pre-Game Insights: A repeat of the T20 World Cup 2022 semi-final between India and England is set up for June 27 in Guyana.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The semi-finals will each have additional time added in order to complete the match which will total 250 minutes.
India, irrespective of where they finish in their Super 8 group, will play the second semi-final.
The Final on 29 June will have a reserve day on 30 June.
Others: The T20 World Cup 2024 semi-final fixtures include South Africa vs Australia/Afghanistan/Bangladesh on June 27 and England vs India on the same day.
